text: Veselin Sarbakov (Bulgarian: Веселин Сърбаков; born 8 August 1975) is a former Bulgarian footballer who is currently U-12 coach at Levski Sofia. ==Biography== Sarbakov spent the majority of his career in the top flight of Bulgarian football, most notably representing Levski Sofia almost continuously between the 1993/1994 and 1998/1999 seasons, making 35 league appearances and scoring two goals for the "bluemen". He also played for Litex Lovech, Pirin, Akademik Sofia, Kaliakra, Vihren, and Hebar. Following Sarbakov's retirement, he became coach of Levski Sofia youth teams, obtaining a UEFA "B" license. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:PFC Levski Sofia players Category:PFC Litex Lovech players Category:FC Hebar Pazardzhik players Category:OFC Pirin Blagoevgrad players Category:Akademik Sofia players Category:PFC Kaliakra Kavarna players Category:FC Vihren Sandanski players
title: Veselin Sarbakov
